title: Brazilian Wins Race to Head Latin America's Top Development Bank
description: Economist Ilan Goldfajn, a former central banker and respected technocrat, beat rivals from Chile and Mexico.

title: Israeli Pilgrims' Attack on Palestinians Draws Condemnation
description: The U.S. Ambassador to Israel describes the riot in the West Bank city of Hebron as abhorrent.

title: Turkey Strikes Kurdish Targets in Iraq, Syria After Istanbul Bombing
description: The attacks hit bunkers, caves and tunnels, according to the government, while Kurdish forces said 11 civilians were killed. They came a week after a lethal bombing in Istanbul, which Turkey has blamed on Kurdish militias.

title: Iran's Security Forces Crack Down on Protest Movement in Kurdish Region
description: Forces fired live ammunition and raided homes in search of opponents in an effort to crack down on a two-month old protest movement sweeping the country.

title: At COP27, Poorer Countries Secure Climate-Damage Fund
description: Poorer countries secured a deal at United Nations climate talks to create a fund for climate-related damage as part of a broader agreement that failed to yield faster cuts in global emissions.

title: Race to Secure Gas for Europe's Future Winters Has Already Begun
description: Some companies are weighing U.S. LNG deals, but talks have hit hurdles because of climate goals and pricing.

title: Ukraine's Kherson Win Shifts Dynamics Across Whole Front With Russia
description: Kyiv’s recent recapture of this southern city enables it to target Russian supply lines running to the Crimean Peninsula, while Moscow strives to redeploy withdrawn troops to Donbas.

title: Ukraine Urges Evacuations as Pressure on Electricity Grid Intensifies
description: Officials encouraged people from recently recaptured territories to evacuate, as the country tries to ease the strain on its damaged electric grid ahead of the winter.

title: U.S.-Europe Trade Booms as Old Allies Draw Closer
description: Russia’s attack on Ukraine and China’s economic travails are encouraging a trans-Atlantic trade and investment renaissance.
